headline: Union Pacific Corporation Declares Fourth Quarter 2024 Dividend
summary: OMAHA, Neb., November 27, 2024--The Board of Directors of Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.34 per share on the company’s common stock, payable Dec. 30, 2024, to shareholders of record Dec. 9, 2024.

raw.headline: Union Pacific Corporation Declares Fourth Quarter 2024 Dividend

headline: Union Pacific Corporation Executives to Address UBS Global Industrials & Transportation Conference
summary: OMAHA, Neb., November 27, 2024--Jim Vena, chief executive officer, Jennifer Hamann, executive vice president and chief financial officer, and Eric Gehringer, executive vice president – Operations, of Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) will address UBS’s Global Industrials & Transportation Conference on Wednesday, Dec. 4, 2024, at 8:50 a.m. ET.

headline: Transportation and Logistics Stocks Q3 Recap: Benchmarking Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP)
summary: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q3 behind us, let’s have a look at Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) and its peers.

headline: My Favorite Dividend Stocks For The 'New World Order'
summary: Trump's pick for Treasury Secretary, Scott Bessent, aims to tackle US debt and economic growth. Check out the dividend stocks poised to thrive amid these shifts.
